# AI Output Format Catalog

> 116 standardized tags for formatting AI outputs consistently

A reference library of format codes that users can include in prompts to specify output structure. Tags are 4-8 uppercase letters (e.g., JSNARR, MDTABL, CODEBL).

## Docs

- [README](./README.md): Quick start, category cheatsheet, usage examples
- [Full Reference](./ai-output-formatting-tags.md): Complete documentation of all 116 tags
- [Interactive Playground](https://kapodeistria.github.io/ai-output-format-catalog/playground.html): Search and browse with live examples

## Categories

- Structured Data (13): JSNARR, JSNOBJ, YAMLCF, CSVDAT, etc.
- Markup & Documentation (13): MDTXT, HTMLPG, LATEXF, etc.
- Lists & Enumerations (12): BULLST, NUMBLST, CHKLST, etc.
- Tables & Grids (10): MDTABL, CMPTBL, KANTBL, etc.
- Code & Technical (18): CODEBL, APIREQ, SQLQRY, etc.
- Diagrams & Visualizations (16): FLWCHT, MERMAD, TREEDI, etc.
- Communication (10): EMLFMT, SLKMSG, TICKFM, etc.
- Academic & Writing (12): CITAPA, ABSTRK, ESSYFM, etc.
- Data & Analysis (10): STATBL, METRCF, FORMLA, etc.
- Specialized (12): USRSTY, FAQFMT, CHGLOG, etc.
- Documentation (14): READMF, APIDOC, CMDREF, etc.

## Usage

Include any tag in a prompt:
```
"Format the output as JSNARR"
"Give me a CMPTBL of the options"
"Show this as FLWCHT"
```
